Dissolution.definition: the act or process of ending

involuntary dissolution.definition: dissolution of a corporation by a court in response to a shareholder petition based on statutorily prescribed grounds

voluntary dissolution.definition: dissolution of a corporation upon the initiative of the directors and with approval of a certain percentage of the shareholders

sub_terms.d: the termination of an injunction or stay by court order
sub_terms.e: the termination of a marriage by divorce
